title: Body Services — The Spa ~ Los Gatos
cleaned_text: LOS GATOS CA [REQUEST APPOINTMENT](https://local.demandforce.com/b/thespaoflosgatos/schedule?d3cp_key=2431246F6E64656D616E64244370507A737A4A5348444A56754E426F433731337430&d3cp_#new_template) [View Complete Service and Price List](https://www.thespaoflosgatos.com/service-and-price-list) OPEN Tuesday - Saturday 10am - 7pm Sunday 10am - 5 pm Closed Monday BODY SERVICES Designed to be therapeutic as well as indulgent, our body therapies offer solutions to detoxify, exfoliate, and moisturize - doing so with delightfully decadent methods such as body brushing, salt scrubs and infused baths. Proven ancient techniques are mixed artfully with contemporary products to ensure results. Whether you need to regain inner balance to your wellness systems, or to be sure your skin glows with perfect tone and suppleness for a special event, our varied therapies can help you accomplish your goal! Please note: A 9% amenities charge will automatically be added to all service prices at check out. Please note that an individual must be 16 years or older to receive any massage or body therapy. CBD Relief and Renewal Body Treatment Experience the ultra-deep relaxation and therapeutic benefits that can only come by utilizing high quality CBD products. Your treatment begins with a gentle body brushing to increase circulation followed by CBD salt scrub for a thorough exfoliation. After a blissful soak in an aromatic CBD infused therapeutic tub, you will receive a head-to-toe massage with hand crafted CBD massage cream with pain-relieving herbs. - 80 minutes: $275 Body Detox Wrap This marine-based detoxification treatment starts with a full body exfoliation, followed by a mud wrap and scalp massage. Then, slip into a detoxifying bath, activating the natural elimination of fat, toxins and impurities. An application of body crème finishes your treatment. - 90 minutes $255 _______ Body Bliss It all begins with a gentle body brushing and salt scrub exfoliation paired with your choice of citrus, lavender or tropical products to bring out the healthy glow of your skin. Then, drift blissfully away in a bath infused with a therapeutic mineral blend. A light massage using deeply moisturizing lotion completes this treatment and leaves you feeling your very best. A relaxing, soothing treatment. - 60 minutes $195 - With additional 30-minute massage $250 _______ Total Emersion Our Total Emersion is for those in need of deep restoration. Experience the sensation of a full body brushing and then slip into a warm bath infused with natural elements designed to revive your newly exfoliated skin and relax muscles while quieting your busy mind. A full body massage follows to release pent up muscle tension and soreness. For the weary, burned out or those in need of a quick staycation, this unique and sublime service offers it all. - 75 minutes $220 _______ The Realm of Roses The ultimate in therapeutic luxury will lift your spirits and revive the suppleness of your skin. Just imagine: a secret ritual of relaxation, a full body brushing and application of an exfoliating enzyme body masque. While the masque is working to rejuvenate your skin, you will enjoy a foot and scalp massage. This is all followed by a rose petal bath and a light massage to apply the finishing touch of rose body balm. Truly, this is a bit of rose-scented heaven. - 105 minutes $285 Please note: A 9% amenities charge will automatically be added to all service prices at check out.
